message: I'll take the lion's share, but you get a little something to start.  Let's see if you're greedy or reasonable.
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not giving you the whole thing just yet. Let's see if you'll compromise.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share. Let's find a fair middle ground.
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to give up too much. Let's see if you're willing to make a concession.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need a slightly larger share to be satisfied. Let's end this negotiation.
I'm willing to split it down the middle, but I'm not going to give you a bigger share. Let's end this negotiation.
